Package index

Make a note

Write or erase notes in a notepad

jot() write_jot()
Jot Down a Note
jot_erase()
Erase a Note

Work with notepads

Create, open, and close notepads

jot_new_pad() jot_new()
Create new jot Notepad
jot_open() jot_activate() jot_active() jot_current() jot_close() jot_deactivate()
Open and Close jot Notepads

Read notepad contents

Read entire notepad or certain entires

jot_list()
List out names of values in a jot notepad
jot_read() read_jot()
Read a jot notepad
jot_skim()
Read in all values from a jot notepad

Set writeability status

Lock or unlock notepads to avoid unintended updates

jot_lock() jot_unlock()
Lock or Unlock a jot Notepad

Helper Functions

get_jot_user()
Get Current User
get_sys_time()
Get System Time as Integer
